verses.verse: And <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>knife,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H1532>barber's<s%> <S%H8593>razor,<s%> and cause it to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H2206>beard:<s%> then <S%H3947>take<s%> thee <S%H3976>balances<s%> to <S%H4948>weigh,<s%> and <S%H2505>divide<s%> the hair.

Thou shalt <S%H1197>burn<s%> with <S%H217>fire<s%> a third <S%H7992>part<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4692>siege<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> a third <S%H7992>part,<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> it with a <S%H2719>knife:<s%> and a third <S%H7992>part<s%> thou shalt <S%H2219>scatter<s%> in the <S%H7307>wind;<s%> and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them.
Thou shalt also <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>thereof<s%> <S%H8033><s%> a <S%H4592>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number,<s%> and <S%H6696>bind<s%> them in thy <S%H3671>skirts.<s%>

Then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H5750>again,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> them in the <S%H784>fire;<s%> for <S%H4480>thereof<s%> shall a <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> I have <S%H7760>set<s%> it in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H776>countries<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> her.

And she hath <S%H4784>changed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> into <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> more <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> more <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> her: <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H3988>refused<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in them.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> ye <S%H1995>multiplied<s%> more <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> you, and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have <S%H6213>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> according to the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> you;

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I, <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H589>I,<s%> am <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, and will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgments<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

And I will <S%H6213>do<s%> in <S%H853>thee<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>done,<s%> and <S%H834>whereunto<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> the <S%H3644>like,<s%> because <S%H3282>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee, and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in thee, <S%H853>and<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of thee will I <S%H2219>scatter<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7307>winds.<s%>

Wherefore, <S%H3651><s%> as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H518>Surely,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> thou hast <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy detestable <S%H8251>things,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> <S%H1571>therefore<s%> will <S%H589>I<s%> also <S%H1639>diminish<s%> thee; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spare,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will <S%H589>I<s%> have any <S%H2550>pity.<s%>

A third <S%H7992>part<s%> of thee shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and with <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall they be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee: and a third <S%H7992>part<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> thee; and I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> a third <S%H7992>part<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7307>winds,<s%> and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them.

Thus shall mine <S%H639>anger<s%> be <S%H3615>accomplished,<s%> and I will cause my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> upon them, and I will be <S%H5162>comforted:<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it in my <S%H7068>zeal,<s%> when I have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> in them.

Moreover I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee <S%H2723>waste,<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> thee, in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that pass <S%H5674>by.<s%>

So it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and a <S%H1422>taunt,<s%> an <S%H4148>instruction<s%> and an <S%H4923>astonishment<s%> unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> thee, when I shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in thee in <S%H639>anger<s%> and in <S%H2534>fury<s%> and in <S%H2534>furious<s%> <S%H8433>rebukes.<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

When I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> upon them <S%H853>the<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of <S%H7458>famine,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for their <S%H4889>destruction,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> you: and I will <S%H3254>increase<s%> the <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, and will <S%H7665>break<s%> your <S%H4294>staff<s%> of bread: <S%H3899><s%>

So will I <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beasts,<s%> and they shall <S%H7921>bereave<s%> thee; and <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through thee; and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee. <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.
